title: Hay : This Is How We Do It

tasks.task: Calving season and hay field management.
subtasks: Identify a calf on the ground during calving season.
Continue hay season despite challenges in field condition.
Operate a small tractor for hay cutting.
Use Tedder machine for fluffing cut hay.
Adjust to new tractor tires with limited maneuverability.
Drive tractor around field, avoiding debris and hazards.
Adjust speed and turning radius due to new tires.
Collect cut hay, ensuring not to run over the tedder.
Manage raking process to create optimal hay bales.
Operate hay baler equipment, ensuring proper formation.
Navigate narrow, unpaved roads to different fields.
Manage drive distractions or safety concerns.
